alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 11:55AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Oneida County through 1215 PM EDT... At 1155 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hinckley, or 13 miles southeast of Boonville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Steuben, Remsen, Prospect, Barneveld, Barnveld, Hinckley and Trenton Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
